quote: Dead. Never been that before. Not even once.
author: Jasper Fforde,  First Among Sequels

quote: Sometimes dead is better
author: Stephen King,  Pet Sematary

quote: I am Dead, but it's not so bad. I've learned to live with it.
author: Isaac Marion,  Warm Bodies

quote: As Dead As "Nothing's changed at my place of birth.It is as dead as I remember leaving it.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: The dead know only one thing, it is better to be alive
author: Stanley Kubrick

quote: Dude, you don't want to be dead. Take it from me. No-pussy is bad. But dead is like no-pussy times ten.
author: Junot Díaz,  The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao

quote: Unbeing dead isn't being alive.
author: E.E. Cummings

quote: Life is but a dream for the dead.
author: Gerard Way

quote: Well, right now I'm not dead. But when I am, it's like...I don't know, I guess it's like being inside a book that nobody's reading. [...] An old one. It's up on a library shelf, so you're safe and everything, but the book hasn't been checked out for a long, long time. All you can do is wait. Just hope somebody'll pick it up and start reading.
author: Tim O'Brien,  The Things They Carried

quote: I am so, so alive.
author: Maggie Stiefvater,  The Scorpio Races

quote: I'd rather die while I'm living than live while I'm dead.
author: Jimmy Buffett

quote: For death is life. It is only living that is lifeless.
author: Mervyn Peake,  Titus Groan

quote: The dead look so terribly dead when they're dead.
author: W. Somerset Maugham,  The Razor's Edge

quote: You aren't alive if you aren't in need.
author: Henry Cloud,  Safe People: How to Find Relationships That Are Good for You and Avoid Those That Aren't

quote: One more dance along the razor's edge finished. Almost dead yesterday, maybe dead tomorrow, but alive, gloriously alive, today.
author: Robert Jordan,  Lord of Chaos

quote: Live free or die.
author: Lauren Oliver,  Requiem

quote: There are three deaths. The first is when the body ceases to function. The second is when the body is consigned to the grave. The third is that moment, sometime in the future, when your name is spoken for the last time.
author: David Eagleman,  Sum: Forty Tales from the Afterlives

quote: The dead can survive as part of the lives of those that still live.
author: Kenzaburō Ōe,  Hiroshima Notes

quote: Things die. But they don't always stay dead. Believe me, I know.
author: Richelle Mead,  Frostbite

quote: That is not dead which can eternal lie,And with strange aeons even death may die.
author: H.P. Lovecraft,  The Nameless City

quote: The dead are way more organized than the living.
author: China Miéville,  Un Lun Dun

quote: The dead do not hurt you; only the living do.
author: Tess Gerritsen,  The Sinner

quote: I die, as I have lived, a free spirit, an Anarchist, owing no allegiance to rulers, heavenly or earthly.
author: Voltairine de Cleyre

quote: I'm dying and all I hear are insults!
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Body is a home, a prison and a grave.
author: James Runcie,  The Colour Of Heaven

quote: Enjoy life. There's plenty of time to be dead.
author: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: The life of the dead is placed in the memory of the living.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Life is for the living.Death is for the dead.Let life be like music. And death a note unsaid.
author: Langston Hughes,  The Collected Poems

quote: Having just enough life to enjoy being dead.
author: Jim Holt,  Why Does the World Exist?: An Existential Detective Story

quote: Everyone dies. It is how one lives that matters.
author: R.A. Salvatore

quote: I g-g-guess...I'm dead?"she heard her own voice call out, strangely high-pitched and thin.For a long time, she heard nothing else. And then:"Hi, Dead. I'm Dan.
author: Peter Lerangis,  The Sword Thief

quote: After I’m dead, I want to ghostwrite my autobiography.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Has No Title

quote: To be immortal and then die
author: Jean-Luc Godard,  Breathless

quote: In the midst of life, we are in death.
author: Agatha Christie,  And Then There Were None

quote: Kill me, or you are a murderer.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: A Word is DeadA word is deadWhen it is said,Some say.I say it justBegins to liveThat day.
author: Emily Dickinson,  The Complete Poems

quote: When you draw something it lives and when you photograph it it dies
author: John Fowles,  The Collector

quote: It is nothing to die. It is frightful not to live.
author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables

quote: And I don't believe you dead. How can you be dead if I still feel you? Maybe, like God, you changed into something different that I'll have to speak to in a different way, but you not dead to me Nettie. And never will you be.
author: Alice Walker,  The Color Purple

quote: A dead thing goes with the stream, but only a living thing can go against it.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: To live is to be haunted.
author: Philip K. Dick,  Flow My Tears, the Policeman Said

quote: There is a certain seductiveness about dead things. You can ill treat, alter and recolour what's dead. It won’t complain.
author: Jeanette Winterson,  Oranges Are Not the Only Fruit

quote: Pray for the dead and fight like hell for the living.
author: Mary Harris Jones

quote: Death? Why all this fuss about death? Use your imagination, try to visualize a world without death! Death is the essential condition to life, not an evil.
author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

quote: Death is the Graduation of the Soul
author: Sylvia Browne,  The Other Side and Back

quote: Pain was good. If I hurt, it meant I wasn't dead.
author: Kristin Cast,  Hunted

quote: Death twitches my ear;'Live,' he says... 'I'm coming.
author: Virgil

quote: My heart hurts that means I’m alive.
author: Kazuya Minekura,  Stigma

quote: when I become death. Death is the seed from which I grow.
author: William S. Burroughs

quote: I don’t know what it means to live.
author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore
